timeline.message:
Document Correction

Reference of external devportal  url port number is misleading.

timeline.author: uvindra
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,7 +91,7 @@ In this guide, let's use two separate instances of WSO2 API Manager, and let's p
             <!--Configuration to set the Developer Portal URL of the current running APIM deployment. 
             APIs published to external developer portals will be redirected to this URL-->
             
-                <StoreURL>http://<ip_address>:<port>localhost:9463/devportal</StoreURL>
+                <StoreURL>http://<ip_address>:<port>localhost:9444/devportal</StoreURL>

replies.bodyText: As per document it is referring the second instance with offset=1 and according to that port should be 9444.
replies.author: arunpatil1983

replies.bodyText: Also document says port should increment by ,1 according to it should be 9444 instead of 9463 for external devportal.
replies.author: arunpatil1983

replies.bodyText: @arunpatil1983 Ya the first too suggestions are correct. But I feel this one is referring to the main dev portal which should not have an offset. The offset applies to the ExternalAPIStore configuration which is mentioned just below this element
replies.author: uvindra

timeline.bodyText: Are you referring here line no 94 should be port number 9443 ?
timeline.author: arunpatil1983
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,7 +91,7 @@ In this guide, let's use two separate instances of WSO2 API Manager, and let's p
             <!--Configuration to set the Developer Portal URL of the current running APIM deployment. 
             APIs published to external developer portals will be redirected to this URL-->
             
-                <StoreURL>http://<ip_address>:<port>localhost:9463/devportal</StoreURL>

replies.bodyText: @arunpatil1983 Yes correct, I am only stating that line 94 needs to be corrected to 9443
replies.author: uvindra

replies.bodyText: @uvindra -Line no 94 has been corrected ,please review and see the file.
replies.author: arunpatil1983

timeline.message:
Corrected external developer url port number

Corrected external developer url port number.
